title: Next European Commission vows to stick to its guns over EU tax on digital giants
text:
Blocked plans for a tax on US digital giants are to be resurrected by the new European Commission, setting Brussels on a collision course with Donald Trump.

The incoming European Union executive will propose a levy hitting American titans such as Google, Facebook and Amazon by the end of 2020, if global efforts to agree worldwide standards fail.

Its plans were set out by Margrethe Vestager, the European Union's tough-talking competition commissioner, who is about to get extra powers overseeing digital policy in the bloc for the next five years.

Branded the EU’s “tax lady” by Trump, Ms Vestager is popular in Brussels after using her wide-ranging powers as the outgoing commission’s competition...
description: Blocked plans for a tax on US digital giants are to be resurrected by the new European Commission, setting Brussels on a collision course with Donald Trump.
